name: Dejarik for PICO-8
description:
Dejarik for PICO-8

Dejarik, a.k.a. holochess, is the game that Han and Chewie play on the Millennium Falcon where holographic monsters beat each other up on a circular board. This version doesn't have holograms, or a Wookiee for an opponent, but you can play it right from your browser! Now you and exactly one friend can master this spacey strategy game. That's right, it's a two player game. Not one. Two whole players!

This version of Dejarik is based on the board game version sold at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge in the Disney Parks. There weren't enough pixels for a detailed rules breakdown in-game, so here's a handy-dandy tutorial. Have fun!

To the right, you'll see the PICO-8 cartridge for this game; if you own PICO-8 and would like to take a look at how I made it, be my guest!
